comment.author: 27604515@N04
comment._content: This is a (please type correctly) Voisin Type O (two Type Ms joined at the wings). Found by Mr. Al Elliot on forum.keypublishing.co.uk. As source he gives "French Aircraft of the First World War" (Davila/Soltan, p.570).
